about:
As a dedicated and passionate developer with 3 years of hands-on experience, I am eager to leverage my background in software development to contribute to innovative projects. !


I have experience with various backend tools such as Golang, Linux, Docker, message brokers, SQL and NoSQL databases, and GitLab. I have successfully created several projects, including a license application that communicates with another application using a different database. Additionally, I developed a POS system for multiple stores and warehouses that includes accounting features, ensuring that every transaction is accurately recorded.
